languages.text: "Инцидент первый, произошел сразу после отбытия с Эурак-V. Леди-Навигатор отчитала одного из посыльных, после чего тот отправился в жилой отсек, перебил собственную семью, а затем застрелился. Инцидент второй, отмечен при переходе сквозь варп. Леди-Навигатор отдала пилотам неверные распоряжения, и корабль сбился с курса — на считанные минуты, однако этого хватило, чтобы силы Имматериума разгневали духов машин, и те устроили пожар в техотсеке".

traits.locale_text: "Инцидент первый, произошел сразу после отбытия с Эурак-V. Леди-Навигатор отчитала одного из посыльных, после чего тот отправился в жилой отсек, перебил собственную семью, а затем застрелился. Инцидент второй, отмечен при переходе сквозь варп. Леди-Навигатор отдала пилотам неверные распоряжения, и корабль сбился с курса — на считанные минуты, однако этого хватило, чтобы силы имматериума разгневали духов машин, и те устроили пожар в техотсеке".

languages.text: "The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."
languages.original_text: "Инцидент первый, произошел сразу после отбытия с Эурак-V. Леди-Навигатор отчитала одного из посыльных, после чего тот отправился в жилой отсек, перебил собственную семью, а затем застрелился. Инцидент второй, отмечен при переходе сквозь варп. Леди-Навигатор отдала пилотам неверные распоряжения, и корабль сбился с курса — на считанные минуты, однако этого хватило, чтобы силы Имматериума разгневали духов машин, и те устроили пожар в техотсеке".

traits.locale_text: "Incident one, occurred immediately after departure from Eurac-V. Lady Navigator chastised one of the messengers, after which he went to the living quarters, killed his own family, and then shot himself. Incident two, noted while traversing the warp. The Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions, and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to set fire to the tech bay."

"Incident one, occurred immediately after departure from Eurac-V. Lady Navigator chastised one of the messengers, after which he went to the living quarters, killed his own family, and then shot himself. Incident two, noted while traversing the warp. The Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions, and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to set fire to the tech bay."

The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them start a fire in the service bay."

The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them start a fire in the service bay."

"The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."

languages.text: “第一起事故就发生在我们离开欧拉克五号星站之后不久。导航者女士斥责了船上某个负责跑腿的船员。那个船员回家之后，就杀死了他所有的家人，之后饮弹自尽。第二起事故发生在亚空间跳跃期间，导航者女士向飞行员传达了错误的命令，导致虚空舰偏离航线。尽管只有短短几分钟的时间，但那足以让亚空间的力量激怒机魂，导致服务甲板起火。”
languages.original_text: "The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."

traits.locale_text: “第一起事故就发生在我们离开欧拉克五号星之后不久。导航者女士斥责了船上某个负责跑腿的船员。那个船员回家之后，就杀死了他所有的家人，之后饮弹自尽。第二起事故发生在亚空间跳跃期间，导航者女士向飞行员传达了错误的命令，导致虚空舰偏离航线。尽管只有短短几分钟的时间，但那足以让亚空间的力量激怒机魂，导致服务甲板起火。”

languages.text: «El primer incidente se produjo inmediatamente después de nuestra marcha de Eurac V: la lady Navegante criticó a uno de los ordenanzas de la nave, que procedió a ir a su dormitorio, matar a su familia y acabar con su propia vida. El segundo incidente se registró durante un viaje por la disformidad: la lady Navegante dio a los pilotos instrucciones equivocadas y la nave salió de su curso. Fue cuestión de minutos, pero bastó para que las fuerzas del Inmaterio enfurecieran tanto a los espíritus máquina como para provocar un incendio en la bahía de servicio».
languages.original_text: "The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."

traits.locale_text: «El primer incidente se produjo inmediatamente después de nuestra marcha de Eurac-V: la lady Navegante criticó a uno de los ordenanzas de la nave, que procedió a ir a su dormitorio, matar a su familia y acabar con su propia vida. El segundo incidente se registró durante un viaje por la disformidad: la lady Navegante dio a los pilotos instrucciones equivocadas y la nave salió de su curso. Fue cuestión de minutos, pero bastó para que las fuerzas del Inmaterio enfurecieran tanto a los espíritus máquina como para provocar un incendio en la bahía de servicio».

languages.text: "Der erste Zwischenfall ereignete sich unmittelbar nach unserer Abreise von Eurac V: Die Lady Navigatorin hatte gerade einen Botengänger des Schiffes gezüchtigt, der daraufhin in sein Wohnquartier ging, seine Familie tötete und sich selbst erschoss. Der zweite Zwischenfall ereignete sich während der Reise durch den Warp. Die Lady Navigatorin erteilte den Piloten falsche Anweisungen und das Raumschiff kam vom Kurs ab ... nur wenige Minuten zwar, aber diese kurze Zeitspanne reichte aus, dass die Mächte des Immateriums die Maschinengeister so sehr erzürnten, dass diese in der Wartungsbucht ein Feuer legten."
languages.original_text: "The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."

traits.locale_text: "Der erste Zwischenfall ereignete sich unmittelbar nach unserer Abreise von Eurac-V: Die Lady Navigatorin hatte gerade einen Botengänger des Schiffes gezüchtigt, der daraufhin in sein Wohnquartier ging, seine Familie tötete und sich selbst erschoss. Der zweite Zwischenfall ereignete sich während der Reise durch den Warp. Die Lady Navigatorin erteilte den Piloten falsche Anweisungen und das Raumschiff kam vom Kurs ab ... nur wenige Minuten zwar, aber diese kurze Zeitspanne reichte aus, dass die Mächte des Immateriums die Maschinengeister so sehr erzürnten, dass diese in der Wartungsbucht ein Feuer legten."

languages.text: « Le premier incident a eu lieu immédiatement après notre départ d'Eurac-V. La navigatrice a réprimandé l'un des ordonnances du vaisseau, après quoi ce dernier est retourné dans ses quartiers, a tué sa famille, puis s'est suicidé. Le deuxième incident a été consigné lors de la traversée du Warp. La navigatrice a donné de mauvaises instructions aux pilotes, et le vaisseau spatial a dévié de sa trajectoire... pendant quelques minutes seulement, mais cela s'est avéré suffisant pour que les forces de l'Immaterium irritent les esprits de la machine au point de déclencher un feu sur le pont des services de maintenance. »
languages.original_text: "The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."

traits.locale_text: « Le premier incident a eu lieu immédiatement après notre départ d'Eurac-V. La navigatrice a réprimandé l'un des ordonnances du vaisseau, après quoi ce dernier est retourné dans ses quartiers, a tué sa famille, puis s'est suicidé. Le deuxième incident a été consigné lors de la traversée du Warp. La navigatrice a donné de mauvaises instructions aux pilotes, et le vaisseau spatial a dévié de sa trajectoire... pendant quelques minutes seulement, mais cela s'est avéré suffisant pour que les forces de l'Immaterium irritent les esprits de la machine au point de déclencher un feu sur le pont des services de maintenance. »

languages.text: 「最初の事件は、我々がユーラック・Vを発った直後に起きました。レディ航宙士がとある船のクルーを厳しく叱った後、彼は自分の住まいに戻り、家族を殺した後に自殺したのです。2番目の事件が起きたのは、歪みを渡っているときです。レディ航宙士は操縦士達に間違った指示を出して、ヴォイドシップはコースから外れました。ほんの数分でしたが、非物質世界の力で機械精霊を怒らせて、サービスベイで火災を起こすにはこれだけで十分でした」
languages.original_text: "The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."

traits.locale_text: 「最初の事件は、我々がユーラック・Vを発った直後に起きました。レディ航宙士がとある船のクルーを厳しく叱った後、彼は自分の住まいに戻り、家族を殺した後に自殺したのです。2番目の事件が起きたのは、歪みを渡っているときです。レディ航宙士は操縦士達に間違った指示を出して、ヴォイドシップはコースから外れました。ほんの数分でしたが、非物質世界の力で機械精霊を怒らせて、サービスベイで火災を起こすにはこれだけで十分でした」

languages.text: "İlk hadiseyi Eurac V'ten ayrılır ayrılmaz yaşadık: Leydi Rotacı, geminin ulaklarından birini azarladı. Adam da gidip ailesini öldürdü, sonra kendini vurdu. İkinci hadiseyse öteboyutta seyahat ettiğimiz sırada yaşandı: Pilotlarımızın Leydi Rotacı'dan aldığı yanlış yönergeler nedeniyle uçsuz gemimiz güzergâh dışına çıktı. Bu vaziyet yalnızca birkaç dakika sürse de Tindiyar kuvvetlerinin makine ruhlarını kızdırmasına yetti ve hizmet bölmesinde yangın çıkmasına neden oldu."
languages.original_text: "The first incident occurred immediately after our departure from Eurac V: the Lady Navigator chastised one of the ship's runners, after which he went to his living quarters, killed his family, and then shot himself. The second incident was noted while traversing the warp: the Lady Navigator gave the pilots the wrong instructions and the voidship was thrown off course — for a matter of minutes, but this was enough for the forces of the Immaterium to anger the machine spirits enough for them to start a fire in the service bay."
